author: Aeoncalcos91

text:
This > Aquatic Ambiance.

Upon initially playing this game, I didn't think it was the most memorable bgm, but on going back to it I think it is.  Big Ape City is really groovy and all, but this has a somber, clear emotional tone that most of the others lack.  They're just catchy.
